item.title: Multimodal LLMs: When AI Sees and Reads
item.description: Text-only LLMs miss half the world. Images, diagrams, charts, photos. Multimodal models see and read - understanding both modalities together.

item.title: How to Fine-Tune LLMs for Your Use Case
item.description: Pretrained LLMs are generalists. Fine-tuning makes them specialists. Adapt to your domain, your style, your task.

item.title: RAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation Explained
item.description: LLMs have a knowledge cutoff. They hallucinate. RAG fixes this: retrieve relevant documents first, then generate answer based on retrieved context.

item.title: The Transformer Architecture: Model Behind Modern AI
item.description: The paper that changed everything: “Attention Is All You Need” (2017).
